food.title: French fries
food.description: French fries, originating from Belgium, are made by cutting potatoes into thin strips, deep-frying them to achieve a crisp exterior and tender interior. Often served hot and seasoned with salt, they're a beloved side dish or snack enjoyed.

food.title: Lasagna
food.description: A rich and creamy whole-wheat pasta dish filled layer by layer with refreshingly fresh onions and garlic, lathered in a succulent sauce and topped with imported, premium quality mozzarella.

food.title: Burgers
food.description: A burger is a savory sandwich consisting of a grilled or fried patty made from ground meat, typically beef, placed inside a sliced bun. It's often accompanied by various toppings offering a satisfying and versatile meal

food.title: Fettucine pasta
food.description: Fettuccine pasta is a type of long, flat noodle made from durum wheat flour and eggs. It's wider than spaghetti but narrower than lasagna, typically served with creamy Alfredo sauce or tomato-based sauces, offering a rich and satisfying dining experience often associated with Italian cuisine.

food.title: Pilau
food.description: A spiced mix of meat and rice, traditionally cooked over an open fire in a leather pot. It is combined in different ways with a variety of components to create a number of highly tasty

food.title: Butter Chicken
food.description: Butter chicken is a beloved Indian dish featuring tender chicken marinated in a creamy, tomato-based sauce. It boasts a perfect harmony of spices and a luxurious finish with butter and cream.

food.title: Sushi
food.description: A small roll of rice that is combined with raw fish, seaweed, cucumber, and vegetables, amongst other ingredients. The rice in sushi is dressed in vinegar.

food.title: Pizza
food.description: Pizza, dish of Italian origin consisting of a flattened disk of bread dough topped with some combination of olive oil, oregano, tomato, olives, mozzarella or other cheese.

food.title: Shawarma
food.description: Shawarma is a Middle Eastern dish featuring thinly sliced meat wrapped in pita bread   offering a flavorful and satisfying street food experience.
